posts.post_title: FT: Low grade Tolstoi Merkle and EPDG Dooin - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Obviously low grade with issues. Looking to trade for pretty much anything T206. Can inclusion option either way is cool too. Shoot me a PM.

Overall and Stahl are traded.
